version_description: This release brings quality improvements for the Rhythm Sync app.
New version of Rhythm 24 firmware that addresses a bug with reported cadence data.
Introduction of customizable heart rate zones.
Addresses firmware update issues with the Rhythm 24.
Expanded export options to include CSV workout summary data.

•Easier to read sync workout screens
•Sensor memory storage usage meter
•Sharing saved workouts with Apple HealthKit
•Improved downloading of long workouts

FW Update: Mode Memory on Power Up
App Update: Birthday year bug fixed, Full Memory Notification Added
